name: iPhone 17 Air
description: Latest iPhone model with ultra-thin design
body: The iPhone 17 Air represents the pinnacle of smartphone technology with its revolutionary ultra-thin design. This device combines cutting-edge performance with elegant aesthetics.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25
description: Flagship Android smartphone with advanced camera
body: Experience the future of mobile photography with the Samsung Galaxy S25. Featuring a 200MP main camera and AI-powered photo enhancement.

name: MacBook Pro 16
body: The MacBook Pro 16-inch with M3 Max chip delivers unprecedented performance for creative professionals and developers.

name: Storage Chest
description: Wooden storage chest for home organization
body: Beautiful handcrafted wooden storage chest perfect for organizing your home. Made from solid oak with traditional craftsmanship.

name: Gaming Monitor 32
description: Ultra-wide gaming monitor with 144Hz refresh rate
body: Immerse yourself in gaming with this 32-inch ultra-wide monitor featuring 144Hz refresh rate and HDR support.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with lumbar support
body: Comfortable ergonomic office chair designed for long hours of work. Features adjustable lumbar support and breathable mesh.

name: Wireless Headphones
body: Experience superior sound quality with these premium wireless headphones featuring active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Coffee Table
description: Modern glass coffee table for living room
body: Sleek modern coffee table with tempered glass top and chrome legs. Perfect centerpiece for contemporary living spaces.

name: Tablet Pro 12
body: Powerful tablet designed for creative professionals. Includes pressure-sensitive stylus and professional-grade display.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with wireless charging
body: Smart LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Features built-in wireless charging pad for your devices.
